Instrumentl (YC S16) | Full-stack Software Engineer | San Francisco (Onsite)

Instrumentl simplifies the grants process for researchers and nonprofits. Over $160 Billion in funding moves between scientists and funders every year yet scientists waste up to 40% of their time hustling for money instead of actually doing science. We are changing that.

We're looking for a Full-stack software engineer with at least 2 years of professional working experience.

You'd be the 2nd engineering hire on our core team so you'd have plenty of impact on our technology roadmap and be instrumental (pun intended) in developing our engineering organization.

Email gauri@instrumentl.com if you're interested. More info at https://www.instrumentl.com
